room_title: Escape room "Wizard Hysteria" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Had a blast with the family escaping the Wizard Hysteria today! 10/10 would recommend and do again!

room_title: Escape room "Wizard Hysteria" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Me and my 2 teens did the Harry Potter horcrux theme and had such a great time figuring out the riddles! It is a little trickier than I expected though, so would recommend it for older teens. The sets and creativity were the best I have seen in any escape experience. The owners of this and the neighboring airborne trampoline park are the nicest people! We will definitely be back many times!
